name: Tianzun
text:
Nuhuhuh, are you awake? My disciple, the senior
that magical girl Snegurochka looks up to, [Player].

name: Tianzun
text:
Unfortunately, your dependable, good-looking old teacher, Tianzun, is just a temporary name.
My true identity is— Ta-daaa!!

name: Tianzun
text:
The great executive of an evil organization, a handsome old villain!
My name is, the Great Happy Demon King!

name: Tianzun
text:
You didn't expect that the great, cool,
and mischievous Tianzun-sensei to be a villain, did you?

name: Tianzun
text:
Now, [Player], I will lead you, the senior that
Snegurochka looks up to, to the path of evil.

name: Tianzun
text:
I'll teach you this kind of evil
and that kind of evil—

name: Tianzun
text:
And make you say,
'I can't see Tianzun as a teacher anymore!'

name: Tianzun
text:
Now, [Player]. This is the new costume I've
prepared for your evil executive form, try it on!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hmm, it suits you very well.
With this, our popularity as an evil duo is guaranteed to explode.

name: Tianzun
text:
Now then, it's time to go, disciple!
...Eh, where are we going? Isn't it obvious?

name: Tianzun
text:
Go, go, go to the amusement park parade in these outfits,
for the promotion of the second season of the new show, 'Magical Girl Snegurochka'!!

Penglai, one of the 23 parallel worlds connected to Tokyo,
is based on the teachings of the 'Tao'.

The 'Mechanism' of Penglai is to consider all
worlds and all beings as a single, connected path.

A characteristic of this is to think of everything in the long term.
Or rather— to think too much in the long term.

Over tens, hundreds, thousands of years,
nothing is certain.

After tens of thousands, hundreds of millions, thousands of years,
no being can go without making a single mistake.

Therefore, higher beings who can predict the future would think,
'Whatever happens, there won't be a big difference in the long run'.

But, another Immortal from Penglai,
a Transient, thinks in this way:

The 'Tao' is a cyclical movement of nothingness and existence.
Or, a cyclical movement of good and evil.

It is not uncommon for something done with good
intentions to become an evil deed in the future.

If everything is connected in that way,
then what reason is there to hate evil?

In that case, I am also evil in the long run.
To put it in modern terms— I'm a little bit evil.

name: Qinglong
text:
That's how Master Tianzun justifies the
blurring of his public and private life!

name: Qinglong
text:
The morality he teaches is an empty theory
that no one but him can comprehend.

name: Qinglong
text:
Students, you must not be deceived by that
evil old man and ruin your future and life, alright?

name: Qinglong
text:
Even though I'm not in a position to talk,
he's truly a hopeless teacher—

name: Qinglong
text:
No, there is one virtue I can praise him for.
He can enjoy any detour in life—

name: Tianzun
text:
Wahahaha!
Alright, the horror team's dance parade is about to start!

As Tianzun, who was at the front of the parade,
gave the signal, the parade members appeared.

name: Boogeyman
text:
Hehehehe, now, children,
let the story of terror begin.

name: Tianzun
text:
Thank you for agreeing so happily, Boogeyman-sensei.
Let's go, it's the horror team's turn!

Next, the marching band of dogs and
cats came, blowing their trumpets.

name: Cait Sith
text:
Here, we'll deliver a heroic song that will blow away your fears!
It's a lively melody from the doggies and kitties!

name: Yoshito
text:
We are the swords of the kingdom!
Now, here come the kings!

Next to enter were the rulers
of the fantasy team's kingdom.

name: Balor
text:
Haha, who dares to call themselves a king,
while I, Balor, is present before you?

name: Hastur
text:
Shall we see which is superior,
your Evil Eye or my plague?

Following Balor and Hastur,
a spaceship parade float appeared.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hey, hey, that's enough.
We, the space team, will take all the children's popularity.

name: Cthugha
text:
I'm the ace pilot of the space team!
Hehe, the kids would rather have a cool guy like me, right?

name: Yoshito
text:
No, Master.
Why don't you dance with us to a fun rhythm?

name: Balor
text:
You all, get away from my grandson!
Or else I will not spare anyo—

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hey, I told you there are a lot of kids here!
Do not use words that are bad for their education!

And finally, the last group, the two
members of the wizard team, appeared.

They were all members that Tianzun had gathered
after being entrusted with the parade by Korpokkur.

name: Itzamna
text:
Hehe, human children prefer the
wizard grandpas, don't they?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Come on, everyone, let's all get along!
Wouldn't everyone be happy and joyful that way?

Tianzun took the opportunity
and swiftly snatched [Player].

name: Tianzun
text: Wahahaha, I'll be taking [Player] with me!

options.text: Oh no~ I'm being kidnapped by the villain~!
Ugh, I can't disobey my teacher's orders.
I'm going to become a Dark [Player]!

name: Tianzun
text:
Nuhuhuhu, [Player].
If the two of us just sneak out of the parade, how evil would that be?

options.text: You're so evil sometimes.
This morals teacher is way too unrestricted!
Teacher, I love you, so I'll join you~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Nuhuhuhu, you say the nicest things.
It's an honor to be a teacher and a villain.

name: Tianzun
text:
I'm the Great Happy Demon King, who follows my own desires!
I won't let anyone else have you!

And with that, the two of them
secretly left the Snowland parade.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hey, [Player]! Over here, over here!
Mwah, mwah, a flying kiss~

options.text: Uh... That's a little embarrassing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, what?
Are you feeling shy~!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: But that's what makes you so adorable, that I can't not love you for it~?

options.text: (Returns a passionate flying kiss)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahhhhh!
You got me, [Player], that's a nice counterattack~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: There's no other disciple in this world who has mastered my teachings and made me so flustered, is there?

options.text: Teacher, you're being way too lovey-dovey.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Such a shy one, aren't you?
I do what I want when I want.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
And when I do it, I do it thoroughly!
Even more than the times when I'm just fooling around.

options.text: So... where are we going?
Just for a little while, okay?
Take me to your naughty class.

name: Tianzun
text:
What do you say to spending some time at the amusement park after school?
Why don't we just have fun, the two of us?

name: Tianzun
text:
I mean, we always go to the amusement
park with a bunch of people, right?

name: Tianzun
text:
I thought it wouldn't be bad to have a
relaxing time with you, what do you think?

note: [There are differences in the choices, it's just that they are purely visual]

options.text: Sounds great, let's go!
(Puts a hand on Tianzun's waist)
(Pulls Tianzun's hand)

name: Tianzun
text:
I'm glad you're so excited!
I would have disappeared from sadness if you had refused!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, this is going to be fun.
We'll make memories just for the two of us.

My path— My purpose,
those have not changed since the ancient times.

It is to make people aware that there is a path between people and worlds,
to unite them, and to make reality a happy one.

In the end, it's best for reality to be fulfilling,
because then reality itself will become a paradise of dreams.

In that sense, Tokyo can be called the
paradise of dreams that I wished for.

Even that high wall—
Perhaps it's there to isolate this place, who knows?

For example, Ueno Academy, where Hastur resides,
is a wonderful example of a good union.

Just like how the Tamers bind the Beasts,
I also do that to [Player], cough, cough...

And there are countless other examples
like Jack and Snegurochka, too.

...But that's why I can't stay here.
I am the one who embodies the 'Tao' alone, a kind of anomaly.

The infinity that connects to everything could
also be said to be 'seeing too far into the distance'.

That's why I can only exist in Tokyo as a part
of a TV show or in a temporary situation like this.

When the show ends,
I will disappear like a wisp of smoke.

This villain named me,
will disappear without anyone noticing.

The main character might be saved at the end of the story,
but the villain is not guaranteed to return.

'Reindeer and Santa, work together to
deliver lots of presents to everyone!'

The description of an attraction in the amusement park played.
The two of them had come to a newly built facility.

name: Tianzun
text:
It looks like a cooperative shooting game, where one person is the reindeer
who controls the path, and the other is Santa who aims and delivers the presents.

name: Tianzun
text:
What do you want to do? There also seems to be a solo mode
where you can ride the reindeer-like ride and play as Santa.

options.text: I want to be Santa!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Alright, hop on my back, [Player]!
I'll give you a safe and comfortable ride!

options.text: I'll be the reindeer.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Leave it to me!
I'll deliver all the presents and make everyone happy!

options.text: Let's compete in solo mode!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's a good idea.
How about the loser has to do one thing the winner says?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That way, it'll be more exciting, right?
Hehe, I'm already so excited about what I'm going to order you to do.

text:
And so, the journey of Santa and the reindeer began.
The two of them accumulated perfect scores at a good pace.

However, in the final leg of the journey, when there was only one present left
to deliver to get a perfect score, they couldn't find anyone to deliver it to.

name: Tianzun
text:
Oh dear, this is a problem.
We won't be able to get a perfect score like this~?

options.text: (Comes up with an idea of who to deliver it to)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, that's the correct answer.
Since it's for everyone but Santa, the last one is for the reindeer.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: It's a wonderful form of union, to give a present not just to the children, but to the partner who worked so hard until the end.

options.text: (Unable to come up with the answer)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Nuhuhuhu, too bad, you ran out of time.
Since it's for everyone but Santa, the last one is for the reindeer.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Not just for the children, but for the partner who worked so hard until the end.
Was it a bit too difficult of a trick question?

options.text: The instructions said to deliver to everyone...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You noticed it at just the right moment, didn't you?
That's right, since it's for everyone but Santa, the last one is for the reindeer.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: It's a wonderful form of union, to give a present not just to the children, but to the partner who worked so hard until the end.

name: Tianzun
text:
By the way, you can also get a perfect score if Santa shoots himself.
That's for when Santa wants to reward himself for working so hard.

options.text: Wait, how do you know so much about this...?
How do you know the specifications?
Tianzun, don't tell me—

name: Tianzun
text:
Nuhuhuhu, I guess the cat's out of the bag.
That's right, I actually supervised this new attraction.

name: Tianzun
text:
They said they wanted a cooperative attraction for two people,
and I thought it was a great concept, right?

options.text: That's amazing, it was so much fun!
That's so like you, Tianzun.
As expected of the Happy Missionary!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Nuhuhuhu, right?
The difficulty also changes depending on the course, you know.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Next time we come, let's aim for the best pair with the highest difficulty.

text:
This was the reason why Tianzun, who usually
prefers parades and large parties, invited only [Player]—

options.text: So you wanted to show me this.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't get the wrong idea.
I just wanted to play with you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: The reveal of this attraction was just a pretext, you know?

options.text: I thought it was well-prepared with the Santa costumes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't get the wrong idea.
I just wanted to play with you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: The reveal of this attraction was just a pretext, you know?

options.text: Weren't you going to show this to everyone?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Honestly, you're so dense.
I said it was just the two of us, didn't I?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I wanted to be with you.
You're so sinful for making me say that.

name: Tianzun
text:
Now, let's head to the next attraction.
Let's enjoy the amusement park to the fullest!

name: Tianzun
text:
Nuhuhuhu, shall we ride that next?
I want to ride that one too, after that!

options.text: You're so energetic...
Let's go!
Wait, let me rest a bit...

text:
Tianzun was so full of energy that it seemed like he could go
around the entire amusement park in the limited time after school.

But just as they were talking, the closing music started playing,
and they had forgotten about the time.

name: Tianzun
text:
You must be kidding me!?
Fun time really flies by too fast...

options.text: Is it that late already?
Let's come here together again.
Thanks for inviting me today.

name: Tianzun
text:
Yup, I'm glad I invited you today.
I had a lot of fun, too.

name: Tianzun
text:
To say the least... It's nice to have a peaceful time like
this with just the two of us, even if it's not often.

The crowd, including the children,
flowed toward the exit to reality.

Tianzun's expression, as he watched them, was surprisingly sentimental
for someone who was always so cheerful and happy.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hey, [Player]. When you disappear like me someday,
will you act the same way I do?

name: Tianzun
text:
...No, I'm sorry.
I said something strange all of a sudden.

options.text: Tianzun...?
(A memory flashes back)
What's wrong...?

name: Tianzun
text:
Don't worry, I'm not going anywhere.
It's just that you won't be able to notice those from Shangri-La any longer.

name: Tianzun
text:
Well, this is where we part ways for today...
I truly had fun, [Player].

options.text: No, wait!
You think I'd let you go just like that?
(Hugs him tightly)

name: Tianzun
text:
Wahahaha, you're such an adorable disciple!
In that case, will you stay with me for a little longer?

name: Tianzun
text:
I'm worried that you might be deceived by some evil adult one day...
Wait, that's me, isn't it!?

Saying that, Tianzun smiled, a smile that was
impossible to tell whether it was a lie or the truth.

name: Tianzun
text:
Nuhuhuhu, taking a student with me this late at night,
I guess I really am a bad teacher?

The children had long been asleep,
it was well past midnight.

name: Tianzun
text:
Do you want juice or tea?
Well, this should be a good snack for a drink.

The table was filled with
snacks and various alcoholic drinks.

options.text: How long are you going to wear that outfit?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You like this outfit, don't you?
Nuhuhuhu, I've caught you staring at me so many times.

options.text: Aren't you going to change?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You like this outfit, don't you?
Nuhuhuhu, I've caught you staring at me so many times.

options.text: Can I change out of this?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, no! I don't want you to change yet!
I want to look at you in that outfit for a little longer because it suits you so much!

text:
Tianzun wouldn't let go of [Player],
sticking to them like glue.

Of course, he wasn't drunk,
as he was drinking the same thing as [Player].

options.text: So you're a clingy person when you're alone with someone.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Nuhuhuhu, I only act like this with you.
In front of you, I'm not really a teacher anymore.

options.text: So you are surprisingly lonely?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that so surprising?
People who like being in large groups are often lonely on the inside, you know?

options.text: There, there, good boy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Nuhuhuhu, I only act like this with you.
In front of you, I'm not really a teacher anymore.

name: Tianzun
text: Hey, what do you like about me?

note: This is pretty awkward considering there's a "Teacher, I really love you" option just now

options.text: You're assuming I like you...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course I'm assuming that.
If you didn't, you wouldn't be here this late, right?

options.text: Please stop being so troublesome all of a sudden.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't say that, come on.
I just wanted to ask you something.

options.text: What's wrong with you today!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm acting normal.
I've always wanted to ask you this.

name: Tianzun
text:
Come on!
Don't be shy, tell me!

options.text: ...The fact that you're fun to be with and I'm never bored.
I guess you're kind and dependable.
(Tells him what you like about him)

name: Tianzun
text:
Nuhuhuhu, I see, I see.
I'm so touched that you would say that, I feel like crying.

name: Tianzun
text:
Humans are like yin and yang, when they find something missing
in another person, they feel the urge to fill it in.

name: Tianzun
text:
Yes, that's how paths cross.
That's the moment I find so endearing, but I—

options.text: Do we need a reason to love someone?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...That's right, you have a point.
That's why I thought you were the best suited.

options.text: I wanted to fill that loneliness.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You really are something.
I'm so lucky to have such a wonderful disciple, in both good and bad ways.

options.text: So you're saying I'm lacking in a lot of things?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: What, are you saying you thought you were a perfect human being yourself?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, just kidding.
No, I don't mean that in a bad way at all.

name: Tianzun
text:
Having room for growth means having potential.
To me, that's dazzling.

name: Tianzun
text:
I'll have you know,
that's not the only thing that attracted me to you.

name: Tianzun
text:
While I can be with you during your student days,
I want to teach you not only good things, but evil things as well.

Tianzun's tone was not mischievous,
but serious and calm.

name: Tianzun
text:
Well, you're probably confused
since I said this all of a sudden.

name: Tianzun
text:
...It's okay if you take your time,
but I want you to think about it.

name: Tianzun
text:
If you say you don't want me to go out too much, I'll refrain from doing so.
'Controlling me is OK!', 'I'd even welcome that!', something like that.

name: Tianzun
text:
Now then, I'll go set up a futon in the other room.
You can sleep whenever you get tired.

Tianzun stood up with a slight grunt
and was about to get ready for bed.

options.text: I'll think about it properly.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, yes, I'll be waiting, [Player].
I'm a very patient person, you know.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But when it comes to you, I might be impatient...
Make sure you don't get messed around by a slightly evil handsome old man, okay?

options.text: (Tugs on his clothes)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm, what?
You want to be with me so much?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, me too.
You're trying to test my self-control with such a cute gesture, aren't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In that case, let's talk all night.
Tell me what kind of slightly evil handsome old man you like.
Saying that, Tianzun made a playful face, as he always did.

options.text: ...I want to sleep with you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa, whoa, are you saying yes already?
I might take you seriously, [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'm not responsible for whatever evil things I do to you if you say things like that~?

text:
If there is a future after this,
whether it's 'good' or 'evil' can only be known later on.

But Tianzun thought. He was used to long paths.
He wanted to teach his disciple how to enjoy the goal that lay at the end of it.

No one yet knows what the future holds
for Tianzun and his disciple.
